properties.conviction: Y in contumacia - ten years in galleys/ jail (galera can be either)
properties.description: a man, his famiglia and his garzone are rolling hemp; they are joined by Santo Malservisi, who  borrows a rolling pin from a "putta" and starts to help; the garzone and he get into a contest/argument over a plant; (I think the Garzone hits first) Malservisi hits the Garzone over the head and he falls to the ground, where Malservisi hits him over the head four more times "with great breaking"

properties.conviction: Y - bandito in contumacia, capitale if found, and body parts placed on the walls if found
properties.description: priest eating dinner when his servant stabbed him in the head repeatedly and robbed him
victim returning from mill with a cart-load of flour when he was stabbed on the bridge d'Idie(?)
massaro called by T.G. to the fornaro where he found Carlo bleeding from the face, unable to speak and dying; witness reports that Isidoro hit the kid while he was sleeping in the doorway
fight begins in bar over drinks and food; is broken up by companions. On the way to work afterwards, antagonists kill one of the peacemakers with gun and dagger
victim found stealing grapes from Monks of S. Gio Batta in field of  Cristoforo Monansi; C's garzone Gioseffo bashes his head in; victim died later that night
Dom.co comes across Cristoforo and thinks C. stole from him, so shot him
slayer cleaning his schioppo which he thinks is empty; it goes off and kills his sister
victim was out looking at grapes and other fruits, and on his way home passed by the "court" of S.r Francesco, who, with Giuseppe, shot Emilio with archibus
victim had quarreled with slayer in April(?) and left town for fear of life; returned five months later thinking to be safe, killed that night
injury with later death
victim attacked at night and couldn't say who it was, but had argued with Giuseffo a few days earlier and G. had said he would break his bones of life

properties.conviction: Y- cond in pena ultima supplici - victim fled to Modenese
properties.description: Giovanna and Giuseppe go to the country to feed the cows, and do not return. The "regidora"(?) goes to look for them, and finds Giovanna with her throat cut under a ladder beneath a tree, and Giuseffo nowhere to be found
an argument breaks out in the market over two cows, a gunfight ensues

properties.conviction: Y - Antonio triremes perpetualis, Domenico triremes decennium annis
properties.description: victim was in the courtyard of Leandra Sansolli when the brother Zambelli arrived and shot him

returning from mass, Gabriele arrived at the stairs leading to Pietro's door, and Pietro shot at him with an archibus, then came at him with a knife; Arcangelo comes to help him and Pietro stabs hm in the "left tit"; Arcangelo dies later
giovanni is playing with a schioppo in the yard, and when his cousin goes out to tend sheep, he pretends to fire it, except it fires and kills Giacomo

properties.conviction: N - absolvit omnes; pace fatta dalla famiglia
properties.description: carnival: Francesco and Girolamo made a float for carnival and brought it into the street and accidentally run over 8-year-old Girolamo

properties.conviction: Y - Pietro in pena ultimi supplici; Lazaro in triremis septennius
properties.description: Elizabeth has her throat cut while in bed; I think they mutilated her chest as well
argument starts during gambling, is finished later in the field near the mill; DOmenico and his brother beat Bartolomeo close to death, he dies later that night
Gio Rambaldi has just returned to his house with a lantern in his hand when he is shot four times by unknown persons, from behind a wall in his courtyard

properties.location: Barisella (contado) - publica strada fra Minerbio e Barisella
properties.description: victim found dead in road with many wounds to the head

properties.location: Crovare, Belli e Imola (contado) - homicidio seguito in Imola
properties.description: the Nanni (father, sons and cousin) go to Imola to kill Francesco due to a long hatred; in defending himself, Francesco also kills Giuseppe Nanni.

ministrale reports an awesome raid on sanctuary - two killers refuge in oratory of the Borgo church, and the Tenente and his sbirro lead a raid to flush them out and arrest them - two sbirri shot, one dies?.
monday morning the body is found; Massaro discovers his identity; Matteo's wife says he got up early Saturday (Sunday?) morning, dressed in the dark, and left without telling her why; never came back

properties.weapon: tagliente - guy is "all bloody, especially around the head" pugnale
properties.description: when Giovani doesn't return from market his relatives fear some injury; Carlo Chiunioli goes to find him and finds him dead
Paolo et amici are walking past the bridge that leads to C. Bolognese when the brothers Morini ("che veniva dal Contrabando") jump out and shoot Paolo who is injured
on the way to mass, Domenico pulls his dagger and knifes Francesco to death

properties.conviction: N - accidental death caused by stupidity
properties.description: body recognitio - young Bartolomeo Fregni is out in the fields and shoots himself in the "collo di piede destra" - is this in the shoulder or the foot?
little brothers are hanging out in a field when older brother Anibale shows up, cuffs Girolamo in the head and the kicks him in the stomach, Girolamo runs a little ways away, and somehow dies?

properties.conviction: Y - pena furcam in contumatia, memorial written after condemnation
properties.description: two witnesses come to the massaro around 11:00 and report hearing three archebus shots, fired by Giovanni Poluzzi, and that Benedetto was killed by the shots.

Battista is on his way to market with some livestock, and stops briefly in Sabbione where he puts them in Anibale's stall; Anibale asks what are you looking for in my stall, Battista is belligerent and threatens him, and Anibale hits him with a sickle

late at night, killers bang on victim's door saying they want to come in and eat and drink; Baldasare responds saying he doesn't feed people at this hour, they break the door down and shoot him in the knee

properties.conviction: Y- Antonio Maria and Francesco Maria to triremes perpetuam
properties.description: Angelo Fabri and Francesco Benni get into a fistfight, and both go for their guns, and Angelo is killed

properties.location: Cassano e Castel Novo di Bisano (contado)
properties.description: Gio Giacomo shoots Giovanni in the stomach; Gio Giac was hiding behind a Quercia waiting for Giovanni to go by - premeditated

properties.conviction: Y - vincenzo in Pena della vita
properties.description: victim and slayer get in an argument and begin hitting each other with bastone; Vincenzo knocks Camillo into a well, gives him two more whacks and leaves; victim dies two hours later

properties.conviction: Y - pena furcam et confiscatione bonum
properties.description: Giovanni Shoots Lorenzo in the chest, takes his gun, and tosses it in a nearby well

properties.location: Villa Fontana e Budrio (contado) quartiere della Pianella
properties.conviction: Y - Giuseffe triremis decennius, Diamante in pena publica fustigatis (flogging?)
properties.description: Cesare and Giuseppe get in an argument on market day April 30, and as they are wrestling Diamante whacked Cesare on the head with (??) and then Giuseffe slices him with a falcinella, and then hits him in the shoulder with a big rock

properties.conviction: Y - triremis decennius, et refectionis ora damnus et interesse partis offense
properties.description: argument between slayer and victim
little girl goes to her neighbour to borrow some soup, and his schioppo accidentally fires while he is cleaning it.
Giovan was walking from Santo Raffaelle past the church and was shot

Pietro tries to sell a cow to Antonio Magni, victim's dad, who refuses; as Pietro is taking the cow away he sees Antonio's sons Dom.co and Gio.ni, and begins insulting them and yelling at them; Domenico yells back, and Pietro beats him with a bastone; Dom dies two hours later

properties.conviction: Y- Zachinolani and Ravasini ad triremis perpetuus
properties.description: Massaro reports homicide and that publica voce says it was the paesani soldati; goes to look at the body which has many sword wounds; victim was with a companion, who "fa il limonato in Bologna nella piazza", who was injured in the hand;  Marc Antonio and his two companions were on their way back to Bologna after eating a salad at on osteria, when they saw an armed gang; the gang leader says "what are you looking at, fucked billygoats?" and Marc Antonio says "you guys are the billygoats" and they fall on his with swords and arme bianche
slayers were hunting in Pepoli's grounds, and Pepoli's gardener and two socii went after them; when they cornered the slayers under a tree, Cristoforo shot the gardener in the head
victim found dead on Sattini's property - Tommaso shot him for trespassing

massaro reports that Giuseffe shot himself with his archibus; Carlo says GIuseffe was trying to jump a ditch when the gun went off, blowing off his finger and hitting him in the collar, near the throat
the two meet at night in the street and Rudolfo shoots Pietro
gunshots during Mass

properties.conviction: Y - Baldassare triremis perpetuus; Francesco in exilio status Ferrarius
properties.description: while Bartholomeo was in the market outside Medicine, he was shot and killed by an archebus. Francesco was arguing with Baldissera over a "Vettura di Semaro"(?) ; they are all three salt smugglers. According to Bart's brother, Bart arrived to break up the fight when guns were drawn, and  Baldissera shot him while trying to shoot Francesco. Witness confirms.

properties.conviction: Y - pena vita all of them
properties.description: while the Sbirri di Montagna were patrolling towards Mongardino, near the house of Gio Batt.a Benvenuti, they were suddenly shot at  by multiple gunshots, and one sbirro was killed

properties.location: Crevalcore e Modena (Contado) via della guisa
properties.description: Massaro hears public word that a Modenese has been killed just outside of Crevalcore; he rings the bell and gathers il populo and goes to check it out; he also hears that the Modenese was killed by other Modenesi
Ercole on his way to Procession of the Carmine in Ponzano, and in the street outside the Chiesa di Zappolino he is shot twice
victim shot at night after barging into slayer's home and trying to kill the father
victim shot after mass; Massaro says the two had argued the night before. I think he also arrested the victim

properties.conviction: Y - pena vita ad Pietro e Giulio, carcerato Gemignano, absolvit Francesco
properties.description: Pasquale was in a field when Pietro and an unknown companion came out of the woods and shot him, then call him a razza di becco

Francesco and Battista are both returning home with their beasts in tow, and block each other at an intersection; Francesco goes first and leaves Battista behind him, and is laughing at him and saying cruel things, and attacks him with an astola (stick) so Batt.a shoots at him with an archibus and hits him in the head.

properties.location: Castel Nuovo e Lisano, luogo detto Ca' de Brilli (contado)
properties.description: Domenico shot Filippo and killed him from wounds in various places
Pietro bashed DOmenico on the head with a hoe after they argued

properties.conviction: Y - Francesco, Giovanni e Michele in pena vita; Antonio, Rainaldo e Pietro in triremis decem annis
properties.description: massaro is in church when he hears gunshots; he goes outside and finds Domenico and Domenico on the ground, the first dying and the second dead; Domenico Lanzoni says the Domenico Fabbri and Giovanni Balducelli came to words and then gun shots

properties.conviction: Y - Francesco, Giovanni e Michele in pena vita; Antonio, Rainaldo e Pietro in triremis decem annis
properties.description: massaro is in church when he hears gunshots; he goes outside and finds Domenico and Domenico on the ground, the first dying and the second dead; Domenico Lanzoni says the Domenico Fabbri and Giovanni Balducelli came to words and then gun shots
the two of them got into a gunfight

body found, on land belonging to the Cardinal Colonna, in a hemp field, by a girl while she was out picking leaves - she says he has a gunshot in his tummy - it's been there a while, the body inspection says it is "covered in worms"
Bastiano and his brothers got into a fistfight with the killers, and lost - a brawl
cursor hears that a homicide has been committed and goes to check it out; I think there was a big gunfight?
victim was "giocando alli dati" with a "barone senza mestiere alcuna", and won two bolognini from him, and when he asked for the money,  Margaritone bashed him on the head with a rock

Giorgio lures Cristoforo out of bed on the pretext of doing some smuggling with Andrea and Petronio - Cristoforo, being a secret agent of Count Rannini, goes along thinking he'll play a trick on them; when he gets to the clearing in the woods, they play a trick on him! Giorgio shoots him in the back and as he is running away for help, Andrea shoots him too

Jacopo and Simone harass Antonio throughout the entire procession and want to duel him; Franc. Maria Ballarini was at the front of the Procession of the Madonna del Carmine,  holding one of the images, and Francesco Maria tries to reason with the jerks, when gunshots broke out and Antonio, his brother Francesco Maria, and one other were all hit. Antonio also received a stabwound to the chest, and Franc. Maria got pistolwhipped

properties.location: Bologna (citta) contrada di Mirasole, Osteria delle due Colonne
properties.weapon: arme da punta, come cortello pugnale
properties.description: one sbirro hears that someone has been mortally injured, another Sbirro encounters Bastiano, who is covered in blood and says someone tried to rob him, when the sbirro goes to his house he finds Francesco (I think) dying of multiple wounds administered by Bastiano

properties.conviction: Y - in pena furcam et confiscationis boni
properties.description: Capitano hears that one of his sbirri has been shot and killed by another of his sbirri; the botteghiere who saw it says they were arguing because Andrea wanted to be left alone to go somewhere, and Giuseffe was laughing at him and followed him

properties.conviction: Y - Andrea in pena vita et confisationis bonis; Giovan Battista carcerato
properties.description: Santi says that Andrea is a wimp who won't go out, he'd rather stay home with his daddy, so Andrea stabs him in the back - says Andrea's brother

properties.conviction: Y - pena furcam et confiscationis boni
properties.description: two friends joking around, GIuseffe tosses a rock at GIo Batt and misses, they start to wrestle and punch each other,  and Gio Batt.a stabs  GIuseffe four times

Sabbatino goes to Domenico's house and says "let's go do some work", so they go out in the field of Giacomo Boschi, and Domenico climbs a tree to gather "lugliatica" and while he is up there Sabbatino shoots him and he dies, Sabbatino goes home and says to his mom "O my god mom, I killed DOmenico  Palnetta

properties.conviction: Y - pena vita et ultima supplice
properties.description: victim walks out of church into a swordfight between noblemen's socii; this is a brawl!
I think he shot at some Sbirri and they killed him? Agostino's neighbour told the sbirri that Agostino stole his pistol. They shot him while he was trying to escape arrest

properties.conviction: Y - Giacomo pena vita, Antonio triremis decennius
properties.description: the two killers tried to take his guitar and killed him to boot - he lives a while
Sabatino and a "friend" (whose name he doesn't know) were out walking when all of a sudden Sabatino felt a stab in his back and turned around to see Antonio

properties.conviction: Y - giacopo in vita, I think
properties.description: Capitano hears from the neighbourhood that Fabiano shot Pietro, goes and finds the dying man who can't speak and then dies, goes to look for Fabiano and arrests his wife and a meretrice who was in his house

properties.location: Bologna (citta) contrada di Galiera, portico delli preti della Madonna di Galiera
properties.conviction: N- no one charged, I think. A mystery.
properties.description: Alfonso on his way home at night when he is shot

victim and husband argue after lunch because she thinks he is going out to get hookers; husband beats her with a fiasco and before he can hit her again she runs to her Neighbour Giulia Antonia's house

properties.conviction: Y - fratelli in Pena Vita, father dies in prison?
properties.description: Alfiere is going in to hear mass, and Pietro walks up behind him, puts an archibugio right to his back, and shoots him

properties.conviction: Y - Domenico pena furcam, Andrea et Giuseffe triremes septennius
properties.description: Francesco is leaving Vespers and the Rubini boys follow him home; he turns around and says, "Andrea, come here so I can have a word, I want to ask if you are my friend or not" but before he can ask Andrea goes at him with a scythe, the other Rubini come up and Domenico caps him with an archibugio. he manages to give a statement to the massaro before dying
victim shot outside the osteria owned by the killer
Antonia asks Pietro if he'd be ok with her moving to her folks' house in her village, and they argued, and he shot her

This busta starts with a denunciation of a gang rape that Giacomo Biagini took part in on 25th June before a second denunciation of the 27th June, where he went to Francesco Colina's house, called him out and began to fight him, and shot him, wounding him in the stomach, arm and head, which killed him

Anibale is watching some friends play dice when Dionisio and Giulio arrive, and one of them pulls out a gun to shoot ANibale in the head but the dice-players stop him, then the other pulls out his gun, shoots Anibale in the arm and pistol whips him across the head

Ambrosio Suzzi (and I assume Domenico) are in the market at Bazzano, and they get to the house of the Bianconi; there, Alessandro Righi warns them not to go any further because he fears some ill for them; and Ambrosio says "I want to follow my way" and goes past about five steps before he is surrounded by ~16 archibugieri who shout at him to stop and start firing, and Domenico is hit in the chest and he dies immediately
two brothers began arguing; words became blows and blows became stabs; Battista ended up stabbing Domenico repeatedly (three wounds)

Massaro is in vespers when he hears there is a dead body in the field; he rings the bell etc etc. Nine days earlier the victim's wife had some kind of encounter with the slayers, where I think they shot her turkey??

Giacomo Toschi's son, Pier Paolo, is friends with Francesco Donati; they share a public woman. The two resolve to run away with her into the countryside, and Pier Paolo steals his father's money and some shirts to prepare for this, bringing the loot to the lady's house. Giacomo learns of the theft and Pier Paolo returns the money, and Giacomo sends his son-in-law  Gio. Maria to the house to retrieve the shirts; Francesco is there, and when the woman denies knowing anything, Francesco grabs his knife and stabs Gio Maria

properties.weapon: ronca (some kind of farm implement? like a shovel or a ho? a pruning hook?) pugnale
properties.description: Cesare and Giovanni Carlani are turning the wheel in the forge, when in walks Giovanni Borghi with a ronca and bashes Cesare over the head; Cesare dies promptly

Marc'Antonio was going to his friend Salvadore's house when he passed Giovan Antonio, who was sitting on a staircase in the courtyard of the Bozzali; Marc'Antonio said "good evenin," and put his hand on his archebus and said "keep away from me (venite alla larga)", Giovan Antonio took off running towards the Cantonata, and Marc'Antonio chased him and lost him, and heard nothing until M.A. was shot in the shoulder

properties.conviction: Y - pena furcam Stephano e Giovanni; Domenico Triremis
properties.description: Carlo was woken up by someone calling for him to come outside, and when he went to the window to see who it was, someone shot him in the face
son finds Domenico dead and cold in the street
MAssaro of Ripoli stops some veturali who are passing through and find in the house they're staying an injured man; his son comes and takes him home to Castione, where he dies
a hat and  a falandiano found near a well; the good men of town lower a hook and pull up the corpse of Giovan Battista Martelli

body found on the bank of the river - the ferryman says earlier the guy wanted to cross the river with a friend on his way to Modena, and then they went into a casello, and the boatman heard an archebus, and then saw the friend on top of the dead guy stabbing him, and then he took off

properties.conviction: Y - Vincenzo in pena vita, Cap.o Philippo in pena vita; altri absolvit
properties.description: sounds like a firefight; two dead immediately, and then when they are trying to move Don Antonio (wounded) from somewhere back to his house,  they shoot him good and dead, then they escaped

properties.conviction: Y - Vincenzo in pena vita, Cap.o Philippo in pena vita; altri absolvit
properties.description: sounds like a firefight; two dead immediately, and then when they are trying to move Don Antonio (wounded) from somewhere back to his house,  they shoot him good and dead, then they escaped
